Container Registry (Preview) Container Registry

Store and manage container images across all Azure deployment types

Apply for 1RMB Trial Buy Now

Azure Container Registry provides storage of private Docker container images, enabling fast, scalable retrieval, and network-close deployment of container workloads on Azure. Azure Container Registry also provides additional capabilities, such as Azure Active Directory-based authentication, Webhook support, and delete operations.

Free during Azure Container Registry preview period.

Support & SLA

If you have any questions or need help, please visit Azure Support and select the self-help service or any other method to contact us for support.

The Azure Container Registry feature doesn’t offer a Service Level Agreement during the preview period. To learn more details about our Service Level Agreement, please visit the Service Level Agreements page.
